overview_of_class: Covers key principles of persuasion and social influence as applied to management and change of health-related attitudes and behaviors as well as the design of effective messages to promote health.
name: Changing Health Behavior
title: SoC HLTH_COM 430-0-20 Changing Health Behavior

descriptions.value: Covers key principles of persuasion and social influence as applied to management and change of health-related attitudes and behaviors as well as the design of effective messages to promote health.
